title: Rename “Caffeine Jobs” brand text to “M Employed”

requirements.text: Replace the user-facing brand text label “Caffeine Jobs” with “M Employed” wherever it appears in the frontend, including the Landing page CTA sentence currently reading “Join Caffeine Jobs today and take the next step in your career journey”.

quotes: Change Caffeine jobs to M Employed

acceptanceCriteria: The Landing page CTA line no longer contains “Caffeine Jobs” and uses “M Employed” instead.
No user-facing text in the frontend UI contains the substring “Caffeine Jobs” after the change (case-insensitive check recommended).
The replacement uses English user-facing text.

requirements.text: Update the browser tab/page title in frontend/index.html to use the product name “M Employed” (English), instead of the generic “Employer–Employee Connection Website (Job Marketplace)”.

quotes: Change Caffeine jobs to M Employed

acceptanceCriteria: The title change does not break app bootstrapping (root mount remains functional).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Backend must remain single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Changing logos or generated image assets.
Renaming canister/DFX project identifiers or package names.
Adding new features beyond text/branding updates.
